name: Crop Drop
description:
Crop Drop is a tile-matching puzzle game about vegetables! Your goal is to water and harvest crops to complete level requirements, or just get the high score!

With three game modes and (optional) Facebook integration, you can compete with your friends to see who can harvest the most crops and get the highest scores and best times!

  • Level Mode: Harvest crops to complete requirements, from simple tasks like "harvest 20 tomatoes in under a minute," to more advanced ones like "get 2000 points, harvesting no corn or strawberries." It's not as easy as it sounds!
  • Endless Mode: Play until you run out of time! You can get more time by completing shipments or getting big chains and harvests.
  • Rising Mode: Crops are rising from the bottom of the field! Harvest as many as you can before they overflow out of the field.
  • The Garden: Pollen you collect in the other game modes will lead to some crops growing here. Check back once a day and maybe a crop will be ready to harvest - and with it, a message from a bee!

Crop Drop is completely free! No paywalls, no in-game transactions, no ads, and the source code is freely available!
